detaileddescription.para: This macro can be used to initialize a variable of type struct in6_addr to the IPv6 wildcard address.
This macro can be used to initialize a variable of type struct in6_addr to the IPv6 loopback address.

memberdef.name: IN_CLASSD_NSHIFT
memberdef.initializer: IP_CLASSD_NSHIFT /* net and host fields, but */

detaileddescription.para: This variable is initialized by the system to contain the wildcard IPv6 address.

This file (together with sockets.h) aims to provide structs and functions from
arpa/inet.h
netinet/in.h
